attributes.action: One Day Holiday On Birth of Prophet Muhammad. (Part 3)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The muslims in the United Kingdom, feel that they require a day holiday from School, Work etc to celebrate the Birth of the Prophet Muhammad by going to the mosques.
For a one day holiday, the muslims will be able to go to mosques:
* Reading the holy book (Qur'an)
* Mawlid Procession
* Reading for our Prophet Muhammad (p.b.u.h)
* AND MORE!!!

This is currently done in many countries world wide, muslim and non muslim. AFRICAN COUNTRIES: Algeria, Benin, Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Comoros, Côte d'Ivoire, Djibouti, Egypt, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Gambia, Guinea, Libya, Mali, Mauritania, Morocco, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Somalia, Sudan, Tanzania, Tunisia, Togo MIDDLE EAST: Bahrain, Iran, Iraq, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Oman, Palestinian National Authority, Syria, United Arab Emirates/UAE, Yemen ASIA: Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Brunei, India, Indonesia, Pakistan, Malaysia, Sri Lanka, Uzbekistan OTHER: Fiji, Guyana (source: MQ International)

NEED 500 SIGNATURES. Insha'Allah (God-Willing)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
